content: looking for a straight-forward free one-piece twiddle mat or twiddle muff crochet pattern whether you re crocheting this for a loved one or as a fidget tool for yourself this twiddle muff is a great thing to keep the hands occupied this twiddle muff is made in one piece using a variety of crochet stitches and yarn colors to create texture and visual appeal make it your own with fancy ribbon funky buttons and pretty beads
